description: Analyzes uploaded vintage, damaged, or blurry photos, constructs a detailed restoration prompt preserving identity, pose, and composition, and generates a crystal-clear 8K restored image using the image generation tool with the original as reference input.

result.restoration_analysis: Detailed analysis of the quality issues detected in the uploaded photo, including blur, noise, fading, damage, and other degradation
result.restoration_prompt: The detailed prompt constructed and used to generate the restored image
result.status: Status of the restoration process - success or failure
